feature_model.name: Electronic Shopping

meta.data: This feature model models a B2C system with fixed priced products
200 University Ave. West, Waterloo, ON, Canada

Sean Quan Lau. Domain analysis of e-commerce systems using feature-based model templates. Master's thesis, Dept. Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Waterloo, Canada, 2006. Available at: http://gp.uwaterloo.ca/files/2006-lau-masc-thesis.pdf.

feature_model.constraints: c13a:~wish_list or wish_list_saved_after_session c13b:registration or wish_list_saved_after_session c9b:~eletronic_goods or size c9a:~physical_goods or size c6:~eletronic_goods or eletronic_goods_fulfillment c5:~user_behaviour_tracking_info or user_behaviour_tracking c4:~quick_checkout or quick_checkout_profile c3:~customer_preferences or preferences c8:~services or services_fulfillment c7:~physical_goods or physical_goods_fulfillment c17:~wish_list_content or wish_list c2b:~registered_checkout or register_to_buy c16:~shipping_options or shipping c2a:~registered_checkout or registration_enforcement c18:~previously_visited_pages or locally_visited_pages or external_referring_pages c1:~special_offers or discounts c11:~availability or inventory_tracking c10:~physical_goods or weight c12:~category_page or categories c15:~permissions or registration c14:~email_wish_list or registration
